body:
Well.. I guess I found the answer for my first question: 
See [here](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/input-output-reference/page-010.html#field-u-factor) : The U factor Field.. the unit is **W/m2K. ** So if I'm not wrong, it would be great if Mostapha or other developers of Honeybee could correct the component hint for next versions..  (Also, it seems that there is a small mistake in the last part of the mouse hovering hint of the other component, "EPNoMassMat" where it says: "if you want to create a material..." )
